meanings: (칼·바늘 등으로) pierce, stab; (표면에 작은 구멍을 내다) prick; (손가락·막대 등으로) poke, prod, jab

examples.korean: In my defense, I wasn't trying to kill him- I just wanted him to stop trying to stab me. 발음듣기 변명을 하자면 난 그를 죽이려 하지 않았다. 단지 난 그가 나를 찌르려 하는것을 멈추길 바랐을 뿐이야 User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 000000(smp1****) Web Collection
examples.english: In my defense, I wasn't trying to kill him- I just wanted him to stop trying to stab me. 발음

examples.korean: He dug his fork into the steak. 발음듣기 그가 스테이크에 포크를 찔렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He dug his fork into the steak. 발음

examples.korean: She stabbed the air with her fork. 발음듣기 그녀가 포크로 허공을 찔렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She stabbed the air with her fork. 발음

examples.korean: He pricked the balloon and burst it. 발음듣기 그가 풍선을 찔러 터트렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He pricked the balloon and burst it. 발음

examples.korean: She was pierced to the heart with guilt. 발음듣기 그녀는 죄책감이 가슴을 찔렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
